question.title: Calculate annual growth rate, measure BMI
question.description: What is the primary method to calculate the annual growth rate and measure body mass index (BMI)?

option_a.title: Body mass index (BMI) is calculated by dividing weight by height
option_a.description: This option is correct in describing a component of BMI calculation

option_b.title: Annual growth rate is calculated by dividing weight by height at a specific age
option_b.description: This option is partially correct in describing a component of growth rate calculation

option_c.title: Growth rate and BMI can be calculated using a formula that takes into account age, sex, and weight
option_c.description: This option is partially correct in describing a component of growth rate and BMI calculation

option_d.title: Annual growth rate is calculated by dividing weight by height at a specific age, and BMI is calculated by dividing weight by height squared
option_d.description: This option is correct in describing the calculation of both growth rate and BMI
